title: Plat 2 ADC LF team.
body:
I don't mind what rank you or your current team is. I'm willing to overcome my solo q ways and become a solid team member. I'm a fast learner and I very rarely tilt as i tend to look at the bigger picture. I would appreciate any consideration you have for me. Send me an invite in game if you're interested on         Citizen Snipps. I'm available on skype and can play throughout most week nights. 
Cheers.

replies.body: Hi mate, added you in game in regards to possibly joining our team, currently have 6 guys and would round out our team nicely, team has 4 golds and 2 plats at the moment so i think our team skill level will be in the same kind of area as yours.

I'm a support main, Don't play ranked like pretty much at all. However I'm pretty good at Janna, She is my main however I can also play, Thresh/Blits/Leona/Nami etc.  Add me on oce if you like! Thanks and yeah please let me know! :D
